name: Deema Affiliate for Woocommerce
author: Deema

sections.description:
Deema Affiliate for Woocommerce is the fast & easy way to implement Deema Affiliate tracking system on your woocommerce.

this plugin just collect data from link clicks that you created in Deema Affiliate Platform after successfull purchase, data we collect from this clicks are totoal price, order id, currency, Deema Affiliate group commission key, and total price of group commisssion key products.
sections.installation:
Simple installation

Deema Affiliate for Woocommerce plugin is available to install via the WordPress plugin library and you can install it directly from within your WordPress dashboard.

Manual installation

Alternatively, you can install manually:

  1. Download the Deema Affiliate for Woocommerce plugin as a zip file.
  2. Upload the folder deema-affiliate-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Configuration

After installation, go to deema affiliate page in admin menu, and enter your Deema Affiliate Advertiser ID
sections.faq:
Do I need a Deema Affiliate account to use this plugin?

Yes. You can sign up for a free Deema Affiliate account which provides access to all our features.

I’ve set up Deema Affiliate for Woocommerce plugin, what now?

go to deema affiliate page in admin menu, and enter your Deema Affiliate Advertiser ID and Save.

Where can I find out more about Deema Affiliate ?

Visit this page to learn more about Deema Affiliate.

What are the Deema Affiliate Terms and Conditions?

The full Terms and Conditions are available here If you have further questions do not hesitate to reach out to our support.

How do I remove Deema Affiliate from my site?

You can uninstall this plugin at any time to remove Deema Affiliate for Woocommerce from your site.

If You Had Diffrent Commission Set in Your Deema Affiliate Panel, You Can Enter Group Commission Key for Each Product in Woocommerce Product Edit page
